Property.Name: Glenview Court (2050)

With remote access intercom, Large 9 Feet high ceiling. 200 meters away walking distance to Metro Vandome (Orange Line), Walking distance to Train station, facing bus stop with high frequency bus service. Near supermarket, restaurant, business center. Ideal place for family.

Property.Name: Ponsonby Manor (4710)
Property.BuildingDescription: Victorian Style 1950s Building with distinctive character. 4 Floor brick building, Exceptional Large Unit, indoor and outdoor parking. Central Heating, Elevator Service, Balcony in each unit, high ceilings, fireplace, hardwood floors, Alarm systems, 24 hours janitor service all renovated and well maintained apartments, Underground parking with remote access, 24h camera security; Facing 90 bus stop & metro (Snowdon), five minutes from downtown, fifteen minutes directly to Concordia and McGill Universities, one minute drive into #15, #20, #720, #40 highway. Walking distance to stores, restaurants, and banks, etc. Steps away from the Commercial street - Queen Mary, near all the service, Supermarket, Banks, Drug Store, Restaurants, etc... Schools: Near all many famous bilingual kindergarten, elementary, secondary schools & colleges, like Villa Maria, Lower Canada College, St. George School, Saint-Luc, Selwyn House, The Study, Collège Jean-De-Brébeuf, École Georges-Vanier, etc. Apartment size: 3 ½, 4 ½ , 5 ½, 7 ½ Rent Includes: Heating, Hot water, Stove and Fridge Washer, Dryer and Dishwasher inside of the unit as option Features: Laundry Room inside the basement. Balcony for each unit. Large and spacious,

Property.Name: Le St Mathieu West (1077)
Property.BuildingDescription: Newly renovated sunny quiet condo in downtown Montreal. 24 hour security, 24 hour concierge service, restaurant, spa and outdoor inground heated pool in premises. Fully furnished clean condo with queen sized bed (linens included), all cookware, all dishware, heating, air conditioning, hot water, electricity, telephone (Unlimited North American calls included), wireless high speed internet, cable, smart TV, recorder, DVD player, dishwasher and microwave all included. Great view of the mountain and steps to Concordia University, LaSalle College, Bell Centre, Saint Catherine and Crescent Street. Five minute walk to metro Guy. Indoor parking available and can be included in the rent. Daily parking also available. Car2Go - Car Sharing onsite. The building shares services with the neighbouring hotel. Worry-free downtown living. Secure and well-managed building. Fantastic downtown location - close to all with quick highway access, STM 747 bus to Trudeau airport at the corner.Full breakfast buffet brunch(all you can eat- not included in the rent but available in the restaurant everyday for less than 20 $ including taxes and tip) Airbnb quote for your reservation is normally lower that the actual and final price. However there is not a big difference , the actual price may slightly be higher than your airbnb quotation.

Property.Name: Monkland Corner (4235)
Property.BuildingDescription: Directly across from the Villa-Maria metro station and steps away from Monkland Village;Easily accessible through public transit are rental demand generators such as the University of Montreal campus, the Jewish General, Saint-Mary’s and Sainte-Justine hospitals, Mount Royal park in addition to multiple lifestyle amenities on Sherbrooke Street West and Côte-des-Neiges Road;Ideal suite mix composed predominantly of spacious two and three-bedroom apartments characterized by high ceilings and luxurious wood finishes;The Property features two restaurants, both of which have been long term tenants and are well known in the neighborhood.The Property is strategically located within steps of multiple rental demand generators including the Villa-Maria metro station Villa-Maria High School, the MUHC super hospital, Highway 15, in addition to multiple lifestyle amenities located on Sherbrooke Street West and within the Monkland Village.   Quartier PerseOpen since 1997, Quartier Perse is the go-to restaurant for anyone who wants to enjoy a wide variety of Persian delicacies.Equipped with an all-wood décor that includes comfortable armchairs and authentic Persian accessories like rich tapestry carpets, the ambiance at Quartier Perse is warm, inviting and very elegant. Lezvos Mediterranean Fine Cuisine Offering guests a taste of the Mediterranean through the very best of Greek cuisine, Lezvos’ menu offering ranges from signature fish dishes to succulent rib steaks. Lezvos also hosts events and conferences, allowing clients to benefit from the ambiance of a professional environment coupled with tailored catering for any theme. Other Lezvos destinations include Mont St-Sauveur and Sainte-Agathe.
Property.BuildingFeatures: Indoor Parking,Surveillance Cameras,Bus Stop Nearby,Metro Station Nearby,Train Station Nearby,Bike Stand Nearby,Bike Friendly

Property.Name: EQ8 (6900)
Property.BuildingDescription: WELCOME TO EQ8 CITÉ URBAINE LASALLE Our housing projects reflect our need for fulfillment and the perfection we thrive for. EQ8 CITÉ URBAINE LASALLE condominiums welcome you into a vast and comfortable environment, aesthetically appointed towards your well-being. Indulge in an exceptional quality of life by reaching the perfect equilibrium between two distinct lifestyles: the peacefulness and tranquility that nature has to offer, along with the buzz of a fast-expanding urban environment. Enjoy the best of both worlds as you discover our prestigious condominiums. EQ8 CITÉ URBAINE LASALLE presents you with a large-scale housing project branded by its construction quality and distinctive elegance—a contemporary living environment that will allow you to fully experience the advantages of urban living while providing a sense of community. You may visualize your new environment within EQ8 CITÉ URBAINE LASALLE by consulting the project plans. Discover your new living environment, and learn more on the multiple advantages of choosing a EQ8-hallmarked condominium.
